item.title: Bitlab - HackTheBox
item.description: Table of contents User flag. Recon Pivot www-data -> clave user Root Flag Recon Bitlab box was an interesting box, user part was typical real-life scenario (actually meet this scenario during multiple pentests) while the root part was my first time Reverse Engineering. Tl;Dr: The user was accesible First we add the box ip to our host file and let’s start!
